data.name: Throwing Punches
data.description:
Throwing Punches is a boxing game where you can punch your opponents from a distance. Throw your punches and control them in flight while dodging enemy attacks. It can be a real workout! You can slow down time if the situation gets out of control.

Go through 12 levels consisting of 4 stages each as fast as you can to stand at the top of the leaderboards!

Test yourself in Endless Random mode - whether you clear the stage or not - you never know what comes next!

Experiment with modifiers - make your fists go faster, disable gravity, or change the slow motion controls!

Now with three ways to control slow motion: manual, "if you move, time moves" and "time slows down when bullets are nearby"

changelog.change_log:
-Enemy ragdolls after death improvements
-Bugfix for shotgun enemies using wrong attack pattern
-Performance improvements

-Tutorial level difficulty adjustment
-Minor improvements to tips on Tutorial level
-Added warning sound when slow motion timer is close to limit
-Moved the slow motion timer bar so it is easier to see how much slow motion is left
-Slow motion timer bar now pops up when close to limit
-Engine update to Unity 2021.3 LTS

*New features*
 - New slow motion mode: If you move time will move
 - New slow motion mode: Time slows down when bullets nearby

*Minor improvements and bugfixes*
 - Background music during slow motion is now more pleasant (and more cool I think)
 - Enabled phase sync functionality to lower latency
 - Fixed issues with UI elements being highlighted unpredictably
 - Fixed issue where in some cases slow motion would slow down time more than it should
 - Added tutorial tips in "Training with dodging"

-Flying fist speed and control of the fist improvements
-New running animation for enemies
-Modifiers UI improvements
-Tutorial tips improvements
Added new game mode - Endless Random - After each cleared stage or death, you will be teleported to another random stage
